DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study determine pharmacokinetic profile 50 mg/kg load dose intravenous levetiracetam ( LEV ) term late preterm infant seizures . Secondary objective evaluate safety efficacy 50 mg/kg load dose levetiracetam term preterm infant seizure , obtain data steady state drug level levetiracetam neonate .
